title: Presents From μ’s Santa!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Cake! Cake! A big, round, white cake!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, are you really that happy?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Because it usually has houses and Santa-san decorations on top, right? It’s a once a year thing, you know? It’s special~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Yeah yeah, you’re right. Let’s see.... There’s nothing else that we forgot to buy, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hey, hey, Eli-chan. I have one more thing that I want to buy....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Let’s buy Santa clothes! Let’s have all of μ’s dress up as Santa and take a video! It’ll be a Christmas present video from us to everyone who always supports us!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eeh!? We should plan out that kind of thing more....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>But I only came up with it just now~! It’s a party with everyone, so let’s do more fun things! Okay! Let’s do it~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Geez, Honoka.... Alright. For now, let’s contact everyone. We need to ask the decorations team to be more flashy<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
